title: Vox Machina Ep. 37 - A Musician's Nostalgia
description: Vox Machina return to Emon to prove their innocence. Now on the hunt for the treacherous Riskel Daxio, they must once again face the Clasp, along with some shady characters from Scanlan’s past.
content:encoded: Vox Machina return to Emon to prove their innocence. Now on the hunt for the treacherous Riskel Daxio, they must once again face the Clasp, along with some shady characters from Scanlan’s past.
